entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
